Package com.example.single_lottery.ui.organizer

package com.example.single_lottery.ui.organizer
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    OrganizerActivity
    The main control activity for event organizers in the Single Lottery application.
    OrganizerEventAdapter
    Adapter class for managing and displaying event items in the organizer's event list.
    OrganizerEventAdapter.OrganizerEventViewHolder
     
    OrganizerEventCreateActivity
    Activity for creating new lottery events by organizers.
    OrganizerEventViewHolder
    ViewHolder class for displaying individual event items in the organizer's event list.
    OrganizerHomeEditEventActivity
    Activity for editing existing lottery events by organizers.
    OrganizerHomeFragment
    Fragment that displays the organizer's home page with a list of their created events.
    OrganizerHomeViewEventActivity
    Activity for viewing event details by organizers.
    OrganizerProfile
    Model class for storing organizer profile information in the Single Lottery system.
    OrganizerProfilePageFragment
    Fragment for managing organizer profile details and image.
    QRCodeActivity
    Activity for generating and displaying QR code for event verification.
